# Build results
bin/
obj/
out/

# User-specific files
*.user
*.suo
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# VS Code folders
.vscode/

# Rider project files
.idea/

# ASP.NET Scaffolding
ScaffoldingReadMe.txt

# IIS Express
.vs/
*.vspscc
*.vssscc

# SQL Server database files
*.mdf
*.ldf

# EF Core Migrations history
Migrations/

# Local environment files
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Local.json
secrets.json

# Others
*.log
*.nlog

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Publish folder
publish/

# Paket dependency manager
.paket/
paket-files/

# dotnet watch
*.dotnetwatch.*

# node_modules (if using frontend with node)
node_modules/
